title: verify user login and registration with admin approval
description: Test the authentication system to ensure users can register and login successfully, and that admin approval is required before access is granted. Verify JWT token issuance and role-based access control.

title: validate dashboard statistics and visualizations loading
description: Test the dashboard API endpoints to ensure real-time statistics and charts for all modules load correctly within 3 seconds and display accurate data.

title: test partners management crud operations
description: Verify the CRUD operations for partners management including creating, reading, updating, and deleting partner records with proper validations and UI feedback.

title: test events management create and filter functionality
description: Test the events management endpoints to create events, categorize them, and apply filters to retrieve correct event data.

title: validate mou management with approval workflow
description: Test the MoU signing ceremonies and updates management including creation, updates, and approval workflows for edit and delete requests.

title: verify report generation with dynamic filters and export formats
description: Test the report generation API to ensure reports can be generated with dynamic filters, date ranges, and exported correctly in PDF and DOCX formats.

title: test bulk data import and export functionality
description: Verify the bulk import of data from Excel files and export to CSV format, including validation of file formats and error handling.

title: validate admin user management interface
description: Test the admin user management endpoints to approve or reject user registrations, manage user roles, and validate uniqueness and password strength.

title: test approval workflow for edit and delete requests
description: Verify that non-admin users can submit edit and delete requests which require admin approval before final action is taken, and that pending requests are visible to admins.

title: verify responsive ui and theme switcher functionality
description: Test the UI responsiveness across devices and the theme switcher component supporting 32 DaisyUI themes with user preference persistence.
